Package cs3500.easyanimator.view

Class ViewImplVisualControllable2

java.lang.Object
java.awt.Component
java.awt.Container
java.awt.Window
java.awt.Frame
javax.swing.JFrame
cs3500.easyanimator.view.ViewImplVisualControllable2
All Implemented Interfaces:
IView, IView2, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
public class ViewImplVisualControllable2
extends javax.swing.JFrame
implements IView2
A editable view for the animation. Has custom stop, start, restart buttons and gives user the ability to edit keyframes and shapes.
See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Method Details

    • initializeFrame

      private void initializeFrame()
      Initializes the pane that all of the information will be on. Contains all necessary info for the editable view. Should be the only main-window initialize method to be called in the constructor. Other initialize methods regarding parts of the main frame should be placed here.

    • initializeButtonPane

      private void initializeButtonPane()

    • getBiggestTick

      private int getBiggestTick()

    • addFeatureListeners

      public void addFeatureListeners​(IControllerFeatures features)
      Passes the features of the controller of type IControllerFeatures to the view. Allows the view to retrieve these features from the controller to execute the proper reaction.
      Specified by:
      addFeatureListeners in interface IView
      Parameters:
      features - the possible actions that the controller supports, of type IControllerFeatures

    • setSpeedAndErase

      private void setSpeedAndErase()
      Sets the speed and erases the text field responsible for setting the speed. Will set the speed to 1 if given a negative number. Max speed is 99.

    • playButton

      private void playButton()
      Resumes the animation if it was paused. If it was not paused then does not change anything.

      Description copied from interface: IView2
